Text: More right-wing propaganda from our least favorite elementary school teacher and neo-con.

I also can't help but notice that you never leave your oh-so-insightful comments on any of the LEFT wing stuff I upload. You have all the depth of a puddle.
technically every republican from about 1960 on is a neocon.  its kind of a pointless moniker, like the  word liberal.  but yeah, every book in this series is total horse shit.

This book is about the originalist perspective of the constitution. 
Thank you.

no its about what jackasses today THINK the founding fathers were thinking when they wrote the constitution.  when in actuality they dont know and are just pushing their version of what they think the constitution is all about.
